Package packstock

Class Stock

java.lang.Object
packstock.Stock
public class Stock
extends java.lang.Object
Class that allows to represent a Stock composed of Products
Version:
v1
Author:
PMOO teachers

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Stock.UnknownCodeException
    Class to detect errors when trying to work with negative integers

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Stock()
    Constructor without parameters that initializes the lastCode to 0 and creates an empty ArrayList of Products

    • removeProduct

      public void removeProduct​(Product p) throws Stock.UnknownCodeException
      Removes the given Product from the list. If the product does not exist, it shows a message
      Parameters:
      p - Product to be removed
      Throws:
      Stock.UnknownCodeException - code does not exist

    • removeProduct

      public void removeProduct​(int code) throws Stock.UnknownCodeException
      Removes the product with the given code from the list. If the product does not exist, it shows a message
      Parameters:
      code - code of Product to be removed
      Throws:
      Stock.UnknownCodeException - code does not exist

    • updateAmount

      public void updateAmount​(int code, int amount) throws Stock.UnknownCodeException, NegativeNumberException
      Updates the amount of the product with the given code with the given amount
      Parameters:
      code - Code of the Product to be updated
      amount - Amount to set
      Throws:
      NegativeNumberException - negative amount
      Stock.UnknownCodeException - code does not exist
